sections.MISSION: 3/2CR Mortar Platoon conducts a mortar direct lay/alignment range.
sections.KEY TASKS:
Familiarize soldiers direct lay/alignment procedures
Complete thorough risk assessment
Ammo draw and coordination
Have misfire procedures on hand
sections.COORDINATING INSTRUCTIONS:
-Meals MMM
-10 gallons water per squad
-Transport to range in MCVs
-SPC Mignott will provide medical coverage
